name: Stormboar
description: The Stormboar is a large creature with impressive physical attributes, characterized by its combination of slashing and lightning capabilities. Its tusks are formidable, and its fur appears charged with electrical energy.
memorable: The Stormboar combines strong melee attacks with electrical abilities, making it a dangerous opponent that can disrupt enemy formations.
goals: To charge at foes, deal damage, and control the battlefield with its electrical abilities.
relations: Related to other large, aggressive monsters, it could be encountered alongside thunder-themed creatures.
environment: Typically found in stormy or wild areas where it can harness its electrical powers.
strengths: High physical strength and durability, alongside electrical and thunder damage immunity.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, wisdom, and charisma, making it ineffective in strategic or spellcasting roles.
attacks: The Stormboar uses powerful tusk attacks, capable of inflicting slashing and lightning damage while also threatening armor with damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Run allows the Stormboar to move through enemies, dealing high lightning damage and manipulating battlefield positioning.
senses: The Stormboar can detect ferrous metals within 60 feet, allowing it to sense weapons or armor nearby.
additional_information: Can deal thunder damage with Thunder Charge and Thunder Leap.
Iron Scent ability helps locate metal items.
The Relentless ability keeps it alive at low hit points.
Lightning Hide deals extra damage to melee attackers.
Threatens opponents with permanent penalties to nonmagical metal armor.
test_queries: storm creature that charges and leaps
